definition: to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Sterile bandages should be applied, along with an antibiotic cream or ointment.
sentences.chinese: 應該使用無菌綁帶，以及抗菌清洗液或者軟膏。

sentences.english: Finally cover the cut with clean bandage willet him(while it heals).
sentences.chinese: 最後，用乾淨的綁帶包紮傷口。

sentences.english: Drain the wound (of blood )before you apply the bandage.
sentences.chinese: 先擠出傷口中的血爾後包上綁帶。

sentences.english: Finally cover the cut with clean bandage willet him.
sentences.chinese: 最後，用乾淨的綁帶包紮傷口。

sentences.english: Then start it at once while I'm splinting his broken leg.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的話，我給他的斷腿上綁帶，你立刻開始急救。

sentences.english: A compression bandage placed over a blister can provide relief.
sentences.chinese: 用緊縮綁帶覆蓋於腳泡上能夠起到緩解的作用。

sentences.english: He used a lot of bandages to stop the bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 綁帶，他的傷口才算止住血。

sentences.english: Pullover hoodie with contrast taping at drawstring.
sentences.chinese: 套衫連帽抽繩綁帶對比。

definition: to take off costume and makeup/bottom garment (trousers etc)
